law.catch_line: Procedure when city and county act jointly.
law.text: Where a city and county or governmental unit are acting jointly, any action contemplated by KRS 183.630 to 183.740 to be taken by the legislative body or bodies of the governmental unit, shall be taken by ordinance of such governmental unit.
law.history: Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 134, sec. 11. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 134, sec. 11. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 179, sec. 40. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 153, sec. 4.
